TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessagePropertyFilter extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制并选择从消息队列查看或接收消息时检索的属性。

span.span: Controls and selects the properties that are retrieved when peeking or receiving messages from a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 实例上的可控制查看或接收消息时检索的属性集。Setting the on a instance controls the set of properties that are retrieved when peeking or receiving a message. 在检索消息信息的实例上设置筛选器。The filter is set on the instance of that retrieves the message information. 将布尔值成员设置为`false`时, 会阻止检索关联属性的信息。When you set a Boolean-valued member to `false`, you prevent the information of the associated property from being retrieved by the . 有些筛选器属性不是布尔值。There are several filter properties that are not Boolean values. 它们是用于获取或设置、 或的默认大小的整数值。They are integer values that get or set the default sizes of the , , or . 检索有限的属性集有助于提高性能, 因为从队列传输的数据量更小。Retrieving a limited set of properties helps improve performance because smaller amounts of data are transferred from the queue. 在上设置属性时, 仅指示在收到消息或扫视消息时是否检索该属性。When setting a property on , you are only indicating whether that property is retrieved when a message is received or peeked. 不会更改的关联属性值。You are not changing the associated property value for the . 构造函数将所有筛选器属性设置为其默认值, 布尔`false`值为。 The constructor sets all filter properties to their default values, which for the Boolean values is `false`. 有关赋给整数值属性的默认值, 请参阅构造函数主题。See the constructor topic for the defaults assigned to the integer-valued properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同优先级的消息发送到队列, 然后检索它们。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例并为所有属性设置默认值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets default values for all properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将所有布尔值设置`false`为, 并将整数值属性设置为下表中显示的默认值。 The constructor sets all Boolean values to `false` and sets the integer-valued properties to the default values shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||10241024| ||255255| ||255255| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcknowledgeType { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AcknowledgeType : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定发送应用程序所请求的确认消息的类型。The property of the class specifies the type of acknowledgment messages requested by the sending application. 确认类型在返回确认时定义。The type of acknowledgment defines when acknowledgments are returned. 在发送消息之前设置属性,请求特定类型的确认。Set the property before sending the message to request a specific type of acknowledgment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Acknowledgment { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Acknowledgment : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定系统在管理队列中发送的确认消息的类型, 该消息确定何时生成确认。The property of the class specifies the type of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue, which determines when acknowledgments are generated. 确认将从目标队列中返回, 并以消息形式发送到原始消息所指定的。Acknowledgments are returned from the destination queue and posted as messages to the specified by the original message. 生成的确认类型取决于所请求的内容。The type of acknowledgment generated depends on what was requested. 接收来自管理队列的消息时读取属性,以验证最初发送到消息队列的消息的状态。Read the property when receiving a message from an administration queue to verify the status of the message originally sent to the message queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在队列中发送和接收包含订单的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 当原始消息到达或从队列中检索时, 它专门请求肯定确认。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指示消息到达目标队列的时间。The property of the class indicates when the message arrived at the destination queue. 这是在其上检索消息的计算机的本地时间, 从 GMT 进行调整。This is local time, adjusted from GMT, of the computer on which the message is retrieved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定是否应将或附加到消息。The property of the class specifies whether the should be or has been attached to the message. 是由消息队列设置的, 接收队列管理器使用它来验证发送方是否有权访问队列。The is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Authenticated { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Authenticated : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收应用程序使用类的属性来确定是否已请求身份验证。The property of the class is used by the receiving application to determine if authentication was requested. 如果请求了身份验证, 并且消息在队列中, 则会对消息进行身份验证。If authentication was requested and the message is in the queue, then the message is authenticated. 不能查看消息的属性, 并确定消息身份验证是否失败。It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication. 身份验证失败的消息将被丢弃, 且不会传递到队列。Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#6)]

member this.AuthenticationProviderName : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定用来生成消息数字签名的加密提供程序的名称。The property of the class specifies the name of the cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message. 通常在使用外部队列时使用。 is typically used when working with foreign queues. 在非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中存在一个外部队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列通过连接器应用程序与此类队列通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#7)]

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定用来生成消息数字签名的加密提供程序的类型。The property of the class specifies the type of cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message. 通常在使用外部队列时使用。 is typically used when working with foreign queues. 在非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中存在一个外部队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列通过连接器应用程序与此类队列通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性表示消息的序列化内容。The property of the class represents the serialized contents of the message. 正文可以包含最多 4 MB 的数据。The body can contain up to 4 MB of data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 将所有布尔型筛选器的值设置为 ，以便在接收消息时不检索消息属性。

span.span: Sets all Boolean filter values to , so that no message properties are retrieved when receiving a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用将所有布尔属性设置为`false`。Use to set all Boolean properties to `false`. 这将导致在接收消息时不检索消息属性。This causes no message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages. 不影响、 或的值。 does not affect the values for , , or . 调用后, 必须将至少一个筛选器属性设置为`true` , 以便接收与消息相关的数据。After calling , it is necessary to set at least one filter property to `true` in order to receive data related to a message. 您可以将单个属性设置为`true`, 或者可以调用或。You can either set individual properties to `true`, or you can call or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法。The following code example calls the method. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ConnectorType { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ConnectorType : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序设置通常由消息队列设置的消息属性时, 类的属性是必需的。The property of the class is required when an application sets a message property that is typically set by Message Queuing. 它在以下两个实例中使用:It is used in the following two instances: - 当连接器应用程序传递消息时, 发送和接收应用程序需要解释消息的安全和确认属性。When a message is passed by a connector application, the is required for the sending and receiving applications to interpret the security and acknowledgment properties of the message. - 发送应用程序加密的消息时, 属性通知消息队列使用对称密钥。When sending application-encrypted messages, the property informs Message Queuing to use the symmetric key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#10)]

member this.CorrelationId : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定消息标识符, 该标识符由确认和报表消息用来引用原始消息。The property of the class specifies a message identifier that is used by acknowledgment and report messages to reference the original message. 它提供应用程序定义的标识符, 接收方应用程序可以使用该标识符对消息进行排序。It provides an application-defined identifier that the receiving application can use to sort messages. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在队列中发送和接收包含订单的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 当原始消息到达或从队列中检索时, 它专门请求肯定确认。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置默认主体缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default body buffer.

value.span: 接收消息时创建的默认主体缓冲区大小。

span.span: The default body buffer size to create when the message is received.

value.span: 默认值为 1024 个字节。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的正文大小指定为消息的正文内容分配的字节数。The default body size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's body contents. 类的属性表示消息的序列化内容。The property of the class represents the serialized contents of the message. 正文可以包含最多 4 MB 的数据。The body can contain up to 4 MB of data. 限制正文大小可以提高性能。Restricting the body size can improve performance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#11)]

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default extension buffer.

value.span: 接收消息时创建的默认扩展缓冲区大小。

span.span: The default extension buffer size to create when the message is received.

value.span: 默认值为255字节。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认扩展大小指定为消息的扩展分配的字节数。The default extension size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's extension. 类的属性表示与消息关联的、应用程序定义的附加信息 (例如二进制大型对象)。The property of the class represents the additional, application-defined information associated with the message, such as a binary large object. 应用程序负责解释的内容。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the contents of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DestinationQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性标识消息的原始目标队列。The property of the class identifies the original destination queue of the message. 它通常用于确定日志或死信队列中的消息的原始目标。It is typically used to determine the original destination of a message that is in a journal or dead-letter queue. 还可在将响应消息发送回响应队列时使用。It can also be used when sending a response message back to a response queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定用于对消息进行加密的对称密钥。 The property of the class specifies the symmetric key used to encrypt the message. 发送应用程序加密的消息时, 或将加密消息发送到外部队列时, 此项是必需的。It is required when you send application-encrypted messages, or when you send encrypted messages to a foreign queue. 在非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中存在一个外部队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列通过连接器应用程序与此类队列通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定用来对消息进行身份验证的数字签名。 The property of the class specifies the digital signature used to authenticate the message. 在大多数情况下, 它是在发送应用程序请求身份验证时由消息队列生成和设置的。In most cases, it is generated and set by Message Queuing when the sending application requests authentication. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息是私有的, 则在发送它并在收到消息时解密。If a message is private, it is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted when it is received. 类的属性指定用于对专用消息的消息正文进行加密的算法。 The property of the class specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性标识消息的类型。The property of the class identifies the type of the message. 消息可以是普通消息、肯定或否定确认消息或报告消息。A message can be a normal message, a positive or negative acknowledgment message, or a report message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#22)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性会影响消息队列在消息传递时处理消息的方式, 以及消息到达其目标时在队列中的位置。The property of the class affects how Message Queuing handles the message while it is en route, as well as where the message is placed in the queue when it reaches its destination. 只能为非事务性消息设置消息优先级。Message priority can only be set meaningfully for non-transactional messages. 事务性消息的优先级自动设置为零, 从而导致忽略事务性消息优先级。The priority for transactional messages is automatically set to zero, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同优先级的消息发送到队列, 然后检索它们。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Recoverable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Recoverable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指示消息的传递是否得到保证, 即使在消息发送到目标队列时计算机发生崩溃。The property of the class indicates whether delivery of a message is guaranteed, even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue. 如果保证消息的传递, 则会在每个步骤本地存储该消息, 直到成功将该消息转发到下一台计算机。If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer. 消息上`true`的设置为会影响吞吐量。Setting to `true` on the message could affect the throughput. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#23)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性标识接收应用程序生成的响应消息的队列, 该消息由接收应用程序发回发送到发送应用程序。The property of the class identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages that are sent back to the sending application by the receiving application. 当应用程序发送消息时, 发送应用程序会指定响应队列。Response queues are specified by the sending application when the application sends its messages. 任何可用队列均可指定为响应队列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 返回到响应队列的消息是应用程序特定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 应用程序必须定义消息中的内容, 以及收到消息时要执行的操作。The application must define what is in the messages as well as what is to be done when a message is received. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#24)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定用来对消息进行身份验证的安全证书。The property of the class specifies the security certificate used to authenticate messages. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性主要由接收队列管理器在对消息进行身份验证时使用。The property of the class is used primarily by the receiving queue manager when authenticating a message. 属性由消息队列设置, 由队列管理器用来验证发送消息的人员, 以及发送方是否有权访问接收队列。The property is set by Message Queuing and is used by the queue manager to verify who sent the message and that the sender has access rights to the receiving queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#26)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定用于发送消息的消息队列版本。The property of the class specifies the version of Message Queuing used to send the message. 当使用事务处理等功能 (仅限消息队列版本2.0 和更高版本) 或数字签名 (用于验证版本1.0 发送的消息) 时, 属性很重要。The property is important to be aware of when using features like transaction processing, which is only supported by Message Queuing version 2.0 and later, or digital signatures, which are used to authenticate messages sent by version 1.0. 发送消息时由发送队列管理器设置。 is set by the sending queue manager when the message is sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#27)]

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指示发送计算机在源队列管理器发送消息时的日期和时间。The property of the class indicates the sending machine's date and time when the message was sent by the source Queue Manager. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 指定在接收消息时检索消息的所有属性。

span.span: Specifies to retrieve all message properties when receiving a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用将所有布尔属性设置为`true`。Use to set all Boolean properties to `true`. 这会导致在接收消息时检索所有消息属性。This causes all message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages. 不影响、 或的值。 does not affect the values for , , or . 调用后, 可以将单个筛选器值设置`false`为, 以限制在收到消息时检索的属性。After calling , you can set individual filter values to `false` in order to restrict the properties retrieved when the message is received. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法。The following code example calls the method. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#39)]

span.span: Sets the filter values of common Message Queuing properties to and the integer-valued properties to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用将以下布尔值属性设置为`true`。Use to set the following Boolean-valued properties to `true`. 下面是最常见的属性 , 通常会与以下内容交互:These are the most common properties a will typically interact with the following: - - - - - - - - - - - 将下表中的属性设置为其默认值。 sets the properties in the following table to their default values. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||10241024| ||255255| ||255255| 属性表示已在其上调用的。 The property represents a on which has been called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法。The following code example calls the method. value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定从目标队列接收发送的消息所用的总时间 (以秒为单位)。The property of the class specifies the total time in seconds for a sent message to be received from the destination queue. 要从目标队列中检索的消息的时间限制包括到达目标队列所用的时间, 以及应用程序检索消息前在队列中等待的时间。The time limit for the message to be retrieved from the target queue includes the time spent getting to the destination queue, plus the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is retrieved by an application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定发送消息以到达目标队列的时间限制 (以秒为单位)。The property of the class specifies a time limit in seconds from the time the message is sent for it to reach the destination queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性标识发送消息的事务。The property of the class identifies the transaction that sent the message. 在接收应用程序中使用此属性来验证消息是否是作为特定事务的一部分发送的。Use this property within a receiving application to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#52](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#52)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#52](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#52)]

member this.TransactionStatusQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性标识源计算机上的事务状态队列。The property of the class identifies the transaction status queue on the source computer. 属性用于向发送应用程序发送确认消息。The property is used for sending acknowledgment messages back to the sending application. 当接收发送到外部队列的事务性消息时, 连接器应用程序使用事务状态队列。The transaction status queue is used by connector applications when receiving transactional messages sent to a foreign queue. 在非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中存在一个外部队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列通过连接器应用程序与此类队列通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#53](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#53)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#53](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#53)]

member this.UseAuthentication : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定是否需要对消息进行身份验证。The property of the class specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated. 不能查看消息的属性, 并确定消息身份验证是否失败。It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication. 身份验证失败的消息将被丢弃, 且不会传递到队列。Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#32)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定是否应将无法传递的消息副本发送到死信队列。The property of the class specifies whether a copy of a message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定是否应将消息副本保存在原始计算机上的计算机日志中。The property of the class specifies whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseTracing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性指定是否跟踪消息在到达其目标队列时的路由。The property of the class specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue. 如果`true`为, 则每次原始消息通过消息队列路由服务器时, 都会向系统报告队列发送消息队列生成的报告消息。If `true`, each time the original message passes through a Message Queuing routing server, a Message Queuing-generated report message is sent to the system report queue. 使用跟踪涉及到设置 Active Directory 和为消息队列企业指定报表队列。Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise. 这些设置由管理员配置。These settings are configured by the administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#36)]
